client.join

Class GameListPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.join.GameListPoller

  • public class GameListPoller
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of the poller is to perform a function on a timer once a second. This function checks with the ProxyServer to see if the ClientModel needs to be updated with data from the server. The Poller will call a function in ProxyServer which will return a ClientModel. The Poller will then call update on the ClientModelController. Domain: timer:Timer server:IServer Domain Constraint: the timer will be scheduled to perform its task once per second

        public void updateGameList()
        Calls function in ServerProxy which will update the ClientModel if it has changed on the server
